title: Adobe After Effects CC 2015 (v13.6.1) RUS-ENG Update 2 by m0nkru
description:
Year: 2015
Version: 2015.1.1 (13.6.1.6)
Developer: Adobe
By assembling: m0nkrus
Platform: Windows x64
Compatible with Seven: full
Language: English + Russian
Medicine: Present System requirements:

- Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Phenom II with support for 64-bit OS
- Microsoft Windows 7 SP1 x64, Windows 8 / 8.1 x64
- 4 GB of RAM (8 GB recommended)
- 5 GB of free hard disk space; during installation you need additional space (the product can not be installed on a removable flash memory device)
- Additional disk space for disk cache (10GB recommended)
- Display with a resolution of 1280 x 1080
- The system supports OpenGL 2.0
- For QuickTime features necessary software QuickTime 7.6.6
- Optional: Certified by Adobe graphics adapter hardware acceleration for three-dimensional visualization using ray tracing
- To access the Web service requires access to the Internet and registration Description:

Adobe After Effects CC 2015 - a popular program for video editing and dynamic images, creating tracks, special effects and animation. Most often it is used to process video (post-production), the creation of music videos, commercials, animations, titles, and many other elements that require digital video effects. Adobe After Effects CC 2015 offers excellent management, a wide range of creative tools, as well as the ability to integrate with other applications for processing video data. With an extensive library of plug-ins developed by third parties, Adobe After Effects CC 2015 is also used in the printing and graphic design for editing static graphic images (photos, images created on the computer, and so forth.).

What changed me: 

- From the ESD-source distribution, containing Russian and English languages, removed all other language packs.
- A number of the original files for patched installer replaced (cracked PainteR), so the opportunity to integrate the updates in the distribution.
- The distribution integrated update for Adobe After Effects CC 2015 to version 13.6.1.6.
- The distribution integrated update for Adobe Character Animator to version 1.0.3.
- The distribution is integrated with an update to Adobe Camera Raw to version 3.9.48.
- The distribution is integrated plug that prevents the installation of spyware mandatory update for Adobe Application Manager Update to version 14.
- The distribution is integrated with the utility Adobe Update Managment Tool 8.0 (developed PainteR), which allows you to set the "cloud" update.
- In the folder Crack inside the image are a set of tools and detailed instructions to register the Adobe After Effects CC 2015.
- By kutsemu installer ESD-version added a menu similar to the Box-version. It made it in the image and likeness of a similar menu for Adobe After Effects CS4
